allow: Bash(cmd.exe /c "where node 2>NUL & where npm 2>NUL & where npx 2>NUL")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "fnm install --lts; fnm default lts-latest; fnm use lts-latest; node --version; npm --version")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-Command fnm -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object Source; Get-ChildItem -Path ''$env:LOCALAPPDATA\\Microsoft\\WinGet'' -Recurse -Filter ''fnm*'' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object FullName")
